org.jlab.coda.jevio

Class EvioNodePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.coda.jevio.EvioNodePool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvioNodeSource

    public class EvioNodePool
extends java.lang.Object
implements EvioNodeSource
    Array-based pool of EvioNode objects. This class is currently used for parsing Evio data in event builders. Not thread safe.

    • Constructor Summary
